basics.name: Henry Mellor
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in Data-Centric Computing at Virginia Tech. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

work.company: Virginia Tech Business and Management Systems
highlights: Assisted clients with IT problems ranging from password resets to large-scale deployments
Personally responsible for the deployment of over 200 machines to various groups of administrative clients
Utilized troubleshooting and problem-solving skills to find efficient solutions to previously undocumented problems
Tutored client in calculus I and II, including basic and complex functions, derivation, integration, and trigonometry
Helped student apply learned topics to relevant real-life scenarios in order to develop problem-solving skills
Employed teaching and communication skills in order to ensure student gained in-depth understanding of learned materials and how to apply them

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students earning and maintaining a 3.5 GPA or higher throughout the semester.
